meanings.definition: Excessive adherence to rules or regulations.
meanings.sent1: Her overcompliance with the school dress code made her stand out among her classmates.
meanings.sent2: The company's overcompliance with safety regulations ensured a secure work environment for all employees.
meanings.sent3: His overcompliance with the 'no running' rule in the library led to him speed-walking everywhere.
meanings.sent4: The garden's overcompliance with sunlight resulted in the plants growing taller than expected.
meanings.sent5: The overcompliance with password complexity made it nearly impossible for anyone to log in.

meanings.definition: The act of complying too much with a certain standard or requirement.
meanings.sent1: The student's overcompliance with the assignment guidelines resulted in an overly detailed project.
meanings.sent2: The team's overcompliance with the budget restrictions led to a surplus at the end of the project.
meanings.sent3: Her overcompliance with the 'no talking' rule in the library made her communicate through hand gestures.
meanings.sent4: The car's overcompliance with fuel efficiency standards allowed it to travel further on less gas.
meanings.sent5: The overcompliance with speed limits on the highway caused a traffic jam behind the cautious driver.
